Plot: Vertigo is a Real Life Superhero. He helps the needy in Padova, his hometown. The movie follows him while he seek a way to leave a better world until, on one evening, an unexpected event will forever change his way of seeing his mission.
Title: Vertigo
Writer: Alessandro Tedde, Francesco Tedde (creator), Francesco Tedde
Actors: Alberto Bartolini, Davide Cortesi, Darkwing, Enzo Maria Ginexi
